data.title: Caldwell & Cowan Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Rodney Daniel, of Conyers, passed away Thursday, April 7, 2022, at the age of 48. A talented carpenter, Rodney was a dedicated employee for Daniel Construction Company where he...
data.text:
Rodney Daniel, of Conyers, passed away Thursday, April 7, 2022, at the age of 48. A talented carpenter, Rodney was a dedicated employee for Daniel Construction Company where he worked as field supervisor. He enjoyed going to NASCAR races, was an avid Georgia Bulldogs fan, liked listening to music, and had a huge heart for animals. Rodney was preceded in death by his mother, Charlotte Daniel.

Survivors include his son, David Daniel, Andrew Daniel; father, Ronnie Daniel (Suzanne); sister, Allison Daniel.

Rodney's family will host a private memorial service at a later date.
